item.title: [Basic] Git Commands (EN)
item.description: Start git / Clone repository 1 2 git init # initializes a new Git repository in the current directory git clone <repo> -b <branch name> <folder name> # clones a specific branch from a git repository into a new directory Check git 1 2 3 4 5 git status # 현재 branch file status 확인 git lg # shows git line graph git log # shows commit log in current branch -> escape = :wq git diff # shows differences between the working directory and the staging area (or index).
